titleStmt.title: Three excellent points of Christian doctrine I. The nativity of our Lord Iesus Christ. II. His bitter sufferings for the sinnes of his people. III. The fruites flowing therefrom, to those that by faith apprehend him. All prophecied by Zachariah in the 8. 9. and 10. verses of the third chapter of his prophecie, and explained in three sermons, preached at Edinburgh by Master Peter Hewat being minister there.
titleStmt.author: Hewat, Peter, d. 1645.

notesStmt.note: Three sermons, each with caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
